body:
Features and Enhancements

Provider List export
  • Address ID
    • Address Id has been added to the Provider List csv export (network360_provider_export), between Group Name and Address Confidence Score.
    • Address Id is the unique Address/Suite (address, address_2) combination.
    • This update affects any export generated from a Detail Results list in Network360.
    • Address Id is not a searchable field within Network360.
